content:
So @Lokathor was asking me whether I thought that creating a project group for the #[instruction_set] RFC was worthwhile. @Josh Triplett and I discussed it a bit in today's meeting. I'm inclined to say "let's do it", it shouldn't be all that much overhead, though we do want a liaison. (I don't know that it merits, say, a dedicated repository.)

I was observing though that I wish we had a project group for target-feature, so that we could kind of "call it back into action" to help resolve some of the questions arising now (e.g., https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/72012).
